extends java.lang.Object
    Holds helper methods that haven't found a home yet

      • scrambleString

        public static void scrambleString(java.lang.String string)
        Scrambles the password into a comma separated string of bytes (and then prints out a descramble to check it worked). REALLY simple algorithm. Pretty much only good for being able to have someone look at your code without being able to remember your password, but I wouldn't recommend posting what the scrambler results are online. It'd be really easy to figure out.

      • descrambleString

        public static java.lang.String descrambleString(java.lang.String scramble)
        Descrambles a password which was scrambled with the scrambler. REALLY simple algorithm. Pretty much only good for being able to have someone look at your code without being able to remember your password, but I wouldn't recommend posting what the scrambler results are online. It'd be really easy to figure out.
        Parameters:
        scramble -
        Returns:
